sentence: Great room lovely site poor food
Warmth and helpfulness of the staff along with the wonderful proximity of our room to the Caribean and dining areas of the hotel
Also my room also provided a butler service
Staff are great the rooms comfortable with all the mod cons you could need
My wife and i stayed as this beautiful resort for two weeks in May The vast majority of rooms face the gorgeous stretch of sand and aqua blue seas

Tuesday night is Managers Cocktail party followed by a buffet with live music at The Palms Terrace which is a beautiful restaurant and yet another amazing buffet with all sorts of fresh fish amazing quality hot meats a pasta station artisan breads I am really not a fan of buffets but this was the exception
Service was excellent and the room was fabulous right on the beach with the sound of the waves to lull you to sleep at night
The rooms are spacious and well appointed with plenty of wardrobe and draw space never usually enough I find and air conditioning works perfectly very important comfy beds and great cushions
The room whilst the hotel maintains a charming colonial style the rooms are modern and exceptionally clean
The 50 plus seaside rooms all very well appointed and updated to the elegant and beautiful Palm Terrace and relaxing Taboras seaside restaurants are fantastic
The hotel is 55 when it comes to the setting the beach the service but the meals restaurants and the value for money is 35Despite that I loved the hotel and the room view all rooms are sea facing
We enjoyed the Tuesday buffet in the Palm Terrace with an excellent band but without them we found the atmosphere a bit flat
Having said that this was not a problem as the sea view was perfect
Lovely position but the rooms need re furbishing and the quality of food particulary at breakfast had gone down
Only disappointment was the noisy groups playing loud music in their rooms
The rooms have been renovated BUT have lost their Caribbean charm they have been decorated to a modern standard and although very nice could be a room in a hotel anywhere in the world
We used to be able to store our suit cases in the wardrobes now the wardrobes are smaller there is no room to do that
No bottled water but had dry cold towels and and water from a spigot
The rooms may have changed but the staff have not thank goodness
The rooms are in a row of 3 story high buildings all facing and on the beach

To date we have received no apologies from the hotel either for the involuntary downgrade to a room lack of early check in being set up lack of butler services nor the mishap over our transport to the airport
Mini fridge in room was not available during stay
The room was lovely as was the butler service but the restaurant was a bit unfriendly we were hassled on the beach
Also the restaurant was shut for refurbishment so had no options for dinner except room service which was slow over priced and not of good quality
